availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Rhodes M. Weddington (Boyd County, KY, hotelkeeper)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, hotelkeeper. Kentucky native. Son of William Weddington and Mary Weddington. Married to Eliza C. Satcher Weddington. Father of Mary E. Weddington, Aurelia Weddington, William W. Weddington, and John C. Weddington. Farmer in Pike County, Kentucky, in 1850. Hotelkeeper in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pike County, p. 492A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 798.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, West Virginia, Wayne County, Ceredo, p. 32B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 12717.
